name: Beltmatic
description:
Beltmatic is a game where you build mathematical factories.

  • Extract numbers from the map
  • Construct buildings that perform mathematical operations
  • Lay down an expansive belt network
  • Deliver numbers to hub to reach the next level
  • Build new production lines and reuse old ones
  • Unlock new buildings and upgrade them.
  • Expand your factory across a huge map
